title: What Are You Doing New Year's Eve
lyrics:
When the bells all ring and the horns all blow
And the couples we know are fondly kissing
Will I be with you or will I be among the missing?
Maybe it's much too early in the game
Ah, but I thought I'd ask you just the same

What are you doing New Year's, New Year's eve?



Wonder whose arms will hold you good and tight

When it's exactly twelve o'clock that night

Welcoming in the New Year, New Year's Eve?



Maybe I'm crazy to suppose

That I'd ever be the one you chose

Out of the thousand invitations you received



Ah, but in case I stand one little chance (one small chance)

Here comes the jackpot question in advance (in advance)

What are you doing New Year's, New Year's Eve?



Maybe I'm crazy to suppose

That I'd ever be the one you chose

Out of the thousand invitations you received



Ah, but in case I stand one little chance (one small chance)

Here comes the jackpot question in advance (in advance)

What are you doing New Year's

What are you doing New Year's

Oh, what are you doing New Year's, New Year's Eve?
